file.name: api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: BackendInfo
  version: v1beta1
  description: |
    Fawkes Backend Info REST API.
    Provides backend meta information to the frontend.
  contact:
    name:  Tim Niemueller
    email: niemueller@kbsg.rwth-aachen.de
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: 'http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html'

tags:
  - name: public
    description: Image public API.

paths:
  /backends:
    get:
      tags:
      - public
      summary: Get list of backends.
      operationId: list_backends
      description: |
        Get a list of available backends.
      parameters:
        - name: pretty
          in: query
          description: Request pretty printed reply.
          allowEmptyValue: true
          schema:
            type: boolean
      responses:
        '200':
          description: get list of backends
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Backend'
        '400':
          description: bad input parameter

components:
  schemas:
    Backend:
      type: object
      required:
        - kind
        - apiVersion
        - id
        - name
        - services
      properties:
        kind:
          type: string
        apiVersion:
          type: string
        id:
          type: string
        name:
          type: string
        url:
          type: string
        services:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Service'

    Service:
      type: object
      required:
        - name
        - url
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        url:
          type: string
